tools.name: fetch_url
tools.description: Fetch and extract page content from a URL (SSRF-protected). Returns extracted text and table rows for spec harvesting.

waitMs.description: Extra wait after load for dynamic content (defaults to 1000)

maxChars.description: Maximum characters returned per field (defaults to 50000)

extractTables.description: Whether to extract table rows as text (defaults to true)

includeHtml.description: Whether to include extracted HTML (defaults to false)
